abstract: Sabra, which sells refrigerated dips and spreads like hummus, launches a new ad campaign suggesting that the exotic tastes of foods from around the world are now available to all just by summoning Sabra.
snippet: Sabra, which sells refrigerated dips and spreads like hummus, launches a new ad campaign suggesting that the exotic tastes of foods from around the world are now available to all just by summoning Sabra.
lead_paragraph: A food brand that is relatively new to the national scene is taking an international approach in its second year of widespread advertising.

headline.main: Sabra, Like Disney, Declares ‘It’s a Small World’
